body:
Your savior is here.

Raws here:https://kkpmh.com/comic/弱点/

Register for an account here: 
https://kkpmh.com/kkpregisteraa80/

I assume you guys can part the links into Google translate to read what goes on which box while registering.

Here's the link thanks to the people at NU:
www.toptoon.net/#contents_80699 
It's called Weakness/Weak point although you won't get any results if you search that since it's a literal translation and no TL teams have picked it up yet so no official english title as of now I think
Srsly need the english name, this art is a beaut.
glad to see author of kill the dead man back with new work.
What is the English translation for this manga ?
